rationale: UPXI momentum exhaustion after +25.9% surge in 2 days without clear catalyst. Professional risk management requires profit-taking on speculation and redeployment into fundamental catalyst opportunity (MYOMO Medicare reimbursement). Eliminates cash drag in 30-day challenge.

execution_queue.rationale: Lock in profits on parabolic move - professional risk management
Deploy UPXI proceeds + cash into Medicare catalyst opportunity

professional_commitment: All future daily assessments will include: 1) Technical analysis with volume/resistance levels, 2) Fundamental catalyst verification, 3) Risk management rationale, 4) Professional trade execution vs momentum chasing.
